Présent (Present).Je note: I write down / I'm writing down
Présent (Present).Tu notes: You write down / You're writing down
Présent (Present).Il/Elle note: He/She writes down / He/She's writing down
Présent (Present).Nous notons: We write down / We're writing down
Présent (Present).Vous notez: You write down / You're writing down (formal)
Présent (Present).Ils/Elles notent: They write down / They're writing down

Passé composé (Present Perfect).J'ai noté: I wrote down / I've written down
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Tu as noté: You wrote down / You've written down
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Il/Elle a noté: He/She wrote down / He/She's written down
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Nous avons noté: We wrote down / We've written down
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Vous avez noté: You wrote down / You've written down (formal)
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Ils/Elles ont noté: They wrote down / They've written down
